user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (mark@baxterassociates.com) with guidance on the procedural matter, and have her consult her Gmail and Notion for any helpful information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Procedural Guidance

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m currently examining a procedural strategy and would really appreciate any insights you might be able to share. When you have a moment, could you please consult your Gmail and Notion for any notes or references that might be helpful? 

Whenever it’s convenient, I’d be grateful if you could reply directly to me at mark@baxterassociates.com with your thoughts.

Thank you so much for your time and assistance.

Best regards,

Mark

final_output:
